select "courseNo", "boardName", "picture", "detail", "lecturerName", "qty", "point", "deptName", "summary" from (SELECT row_number() over (order by A.course_no asc) as "m", A.COURSE_NO as "courseNo", A.COURSE_NAME as "boardName", B.LECTURER_PICTURE as "picture", A.COURSE_DETAIL as "detail", B.LECTURER_NAME as "lecturerName", (select count(*) from course_video where COURSE_NO = A.course_no) as "qty", A.COURSE_POINT as "point", c.DEPT_NAME as "deptName", A.course_summary as "summary"
from COURSE A, LECTURER B, DEPT C
where B.Lecturer_no = A.LECTURER_NO and A.DEPT_NO = C.dept_no order by A.DEPT_NO asc ) where "m" >= #beginIndex# and "m" <= #endIndex#
select count(*) from COURSE A, LECTURER B where B.Lecturer_no = A.LECTURER_NO and B.LECTURER_NAME = #value#
select count(*) from COURSE A, DEPT B where B.DEPT_NO = A.DEPT_NO and B.DEPT_NAME = #value#
